roleset.name: amorous

role.descr: romancer (may be animate, inanimate, or actions)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SMS. Relation to

example.name: verbal rel:
example.text: I watched attentively as Perry Como and Dean Martin songs romanced her through the speakers.
example.arg: Perry Como and Dean Martin songs

example.name: arg0
example.text: If need be I can throw it out tonight . But it 's not very romantic .

roleset.name: idealized (but not pertaining to amour)
roleset.note: Added by Julia. Relation to romanticize.01.

example.name: both args
example.text: The idea was very romantic to me, being that Pink Floyd had such an impact on my childhood, even though I am not overly familiar with the music of Vera Lynn herself.
example.arg: being that Pink Floyd had such an impact on my childhood
even though I am not overly familiar with the music of Vera Lynn herself
